mapper.select: SELECT SUM(A.PROD_QTY) AS PROD_QTY, SUM(A.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) AS FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY, CONVERT(DATE, A.EVENTTIME) AS EVENTTIME FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND CONVERT(DATE, A.EVENTTIME) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, A.EVENTTIME);

SELECT A.REJECT_ITEMID, A.FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY, A.REJECT_TYPE, A.EVENTTIME FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND DATEPART(YEAR, A.EVENTTIME) = DATEPART(YEAR, GETDATE()) AND DATEPART(MONTH, A.EVENTTIME) = #{month}
SELECT A.REJECT_ITEMID, A.FIRSTTIME_REJECT_QTY, A.REJECT_TYPE FROM DSP_REJECT_CONTENTS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable'
